description: Collaborated with development agency to re-design and re-build the Zero Motorcycles website from scratch. Created project timeline, held semiweekly dev stand-ups, and contributed in development. With 14 unique locales, a headless Shopify e-commerce site, model pages, dealer locator, and a variety of other new pages - we deployed the project within 6 months of start.

Worked with an e-commerce business to improve their website user experience, increase visibility, and drive more conversions. The project included a full rebrand, redesign of the home and product pages with a mobile-first focus, integration of analytics tools for better insight into user behavior, and implementation of SEO-focused copywriting.

Built web forms and dealer locator for Zero website. Connected Meta, Google, and DealerSpike forms to HubSpot through Zapier. Created script in HubSpot to accurately route global lead submissions to closest dealer by drivng distance. Increased lead submissions routing accuracy by 34%.
